website_summaries.verdict: If you enjoy crunchy snacks and nutty flavors, these healthy yet relatively pricey keto-optimized, gluten-free, and vegan Dang Bars are certainly worth a taste.
pros: High fat, fair protein, and low carbs
Smooth vanilla and nutty almond chunks
No added sugar or artificial sweeteners
cons: Expensive due to its premium ingredients

customer_reviews.title: Keto yummy!
customer_reviews.text: These are very tasty. Especially like when I get an extra salty bite. Just wish they were a little bigger. UPDATE: just got myself a blood ketone meter and these are definitely not keto. I was at 1.3 this morning and this is the only thing I ate and I even did a bunch of errands running around and worked up a little sweat. I rechecked my ketone thinking I would be a little higher and no- I am actually at 0.4 so technically out of ketosis. 😡😡😡😡😡 No wonder I haven’t been doing as well as I should be since I started eating these.
customer_reviews.author: KMidcap

customer_reviews.title: Best Keto protein bar I’ve found!
customer_reviews.text: These are so perfect for the Keto diet. I got one of the lemon matcha flavored bars in my keto subscription box and I was a little leary of the flavor ... until I tried it. WOW. It has a mild lemon flavor but was so tasty. The texture is crumbly, not super chewy like other protein bars. They also have visible bits of sunflower seeds for extra crunch. I eat one a day now and will continue to purchase this brand as my go-to protein bar. So delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Kbl

customer_reviews.title: Taste old, no code dates on box or packaging that I could find.
customer_reviews.text: First off, I am keto adapted so the taste issue is not the reason for this review. You know how chocolate gets when its old and gets that powdery crumbly texture? They look and tastes like that. So I looked the box over for a code date and also the package itself, and also under the flap at the seam but I did not see it one. So who knows when these were made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another keto product
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying all these so called Keto snacks and bars. Some are good and some are bad. These aren't too bad actually. At first glance they look pasty and I thought it was gonna be a dough ball in my mouth. They are kinda crumbly and packed full of nuts and stuff. It's got that crunch in it and the taste is good to me. Now they might taste better or worse to others because c'mon our taste buds are all different. The lemon one I swear tastes like fruit loops. All in all they are good but a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: BigMigz

customer_reviews.title: Ditch the Quest Bar! Grab a Dang Bar!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Prior to experiencing Dang, I was a Quest Bar eater. And I dont mean occassionally. Quest Bar was my go to snack for over 2 years. On a whim I decided to try the Dang bar, as it too (like the Quest Bar) fit my keto diet. Not only was I shocked at the taste, but the ingredients are FAR better than Quest. Added bonus, it contains pea protein (huge fan) and is plant based (huge win). I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: GlitzyGirlTX

customer_reviews.title: Best I’ve seen for Ketogenic diet
customer_reviews.text: Unlike a lot of Keto-friendly bars, this really does have the proper proportions of fat to protein to carb. They are higher in net carbs than some but their total fat is fantastic. I got the variety box & I’m glad I did. I would never have tried Lemon Matcha otherwise, and it is very tasty. They really are dang good. They’re full of seeds and coconut so your teeth actually get to do some work.
customer_reviews.author: L. Bruner

customer_reviews.title: These are AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I could live off these these bars if I had to! They are satisfying, and very tasty. Better than any bar I've bought off the retail big box stores. I can't decide which flavor I like best.
customer_reviews.author: SKBSOB

customer_reviews.title: Eewwwwwww!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Literally tasted like dirt and everything on my spice rack. Thinking it was just me I had my girlfriend try one. She didn't talk to me for 3 days. 2 bites and the whole box in the trash. Inedible
customer_reviews.author: Mario F.

customer_reviews.title: Dang bars are good and not dry
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at how good and filling the Dang bars are. Great for a snack on the go. I usually buy the bulletproof bars but they are very dry so I wanted to try another brand that is also Keto friendly. The Dang bars are tasty. The vanilla is the best. I love chocolate and lemon but the vanilla tastes incredible. Moist too so you're not gagging while eating it.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Wess

customer_reviews.title: TASTES LIKE CHALK - Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I'm not picky when it comes to protein or keto bars but this one is AWFUL. I can't believe it has good reviews. I'm upset I spent money on these. The only reason why I bought them is because the Keto Crave bars werent available for prime but I'd much rather wait for the long shipping to get bars that actually taste good!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Unicorn

customer_reviews.title: Pretty terrible.
customer_reviews.text: These taste bad. They're dry, chalky and flavorless. They're like hard, dry, stale, tasteless crackers. I bought the variety box. I tried three of them (one after the other), but couldn't take more than a few bites from any of them. They were supposedly different flavors, but I couldn't tell without looking at the label what the flavors were supposed to be. I'm mystified that people are giving these 5 star ratings. If you want something keto that doesn't taste like candy, just eat some nuts, bro. Leave these guys in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Nils

customer_reviews.title: Low total carbohydrates
customer_reviews.text: I've seen and tasted so many "healthy" bars and so called protein bars but all of them have more than 10g of total carbohydrates. Since sugar can be hidden in many other label names, I just look for total carbs and based on this criterion, Dang is the best. It tastes great too. The blue one tastes the best in my opinion, then the yellow and then the chocolate. I buy them by boxes and they all finish in a week or at most two!
customer_reviews.author: Asra Baig

customer_reviews.title: Best Treat for Health Warriors!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic flavor and texture! This is my “go to” treat. If I find myself thinking, “One cookie/candy/cake won’t hurt”, I grab this Lemon Matcha bar and all is right with the World, again. The seeds and crunchy bits are delightfully satisfying!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great vegan low carb choice
customer_reviews.text: I bought the multipack and all the bars tasted fine. The texture is a little dry, but as someone who is allergic to dairy and gluten and travels weekly for my job, I am thrilled to have a vegan, low carb option. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Fit Girl

customer_reviews.title: These are by far the most delicious Keto carb-replacement snacks I've tried!
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor -- all varieties. Perfect assortment of flavors too. Not too sweet, no weird aftertaste, and great texture! They are crunchy and buttery. The chocolate tastes like chocolate. The lemon tastes like a lemony sugar cookie. The almond tastes like Italian butter cookies. I'm in love. BUT...and I'm not knocking off a star for this, they're really expensive! I'd definitely buy more often if they weren't so expensive!
customer_reviews.author: M.L.R. Deyo

customer_reviews.title: Ho hum, not yum
customer_reviews.text: The good news is that no one is going to be stealing these bars from my keto snack stash. They taste okay, which is disappointing after reading so many overly positive reviews. There's a funny slight after taste and, well, they just aren't great. But that means I won't be tempted to eat more than one when craving a sweet treat. And the 11 bars left in the box I just bought will last a really long time. Dang!
customer_reviews.author: oslpod

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic - fresh lemon flavor and very satisfying
customer_reviews.text: I first tried one of these after purchasing one from a Whole Foods while traveling on a ski trip. I am typically not a fan of most protein bars becasue I find them way too sweet or too carby. I absolutely love this bar. Lemon is the only flavor I've tried (but I want to try the other ones). The texture is perfect. The lemony flavor is fresh and real. And these are really satisfying. I keep a bunch in my glovebox, purse, and at my desk.
customer_reviews.author: chlohan

customer_reviews.title: The good the bad the ugly.  Mostly good
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered three boxes now. The first time I tried them I thought the texture was weird (like astronaut food) but after I met with them I liked them! Healthy easy snack that’s plant based! I’ve tried sooo many different bar, and to be honest I will stick with the Dang bars. They are rather expensive and I do feel they are overpriced, I’m hoping as they become more popular the company lowers the price.
customer_reviews.author: VS

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, just not what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I'm looking for a keto bar for after my workouts that will hold me until lunch and unfortunately these don't work for me. It may be because they are plant protein, they may be because my bodies changing as I get older, or it may be because I'm doing strength training, who knows. As for taste, they aren't bad. I love chocolate and unfortunately the chocolate in this case are my least favorite. I truly dislike most lemon items and surprisingly the lemon were my favorite. The vanilla were good. I would say to at least give these a try before dismissing them, I could see where they'd work for some people.
customer_reviews.author: Glynn A. Bogle

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and nutritious
customer_reviews.text: These are my new go to snack! They are mostly just seeds, but have a yummy subtly-lemon taste. Don’t expect them to be super sweet or flavorful. The more you eat them, the better they taste as your tastebuds adjust. I wish these were a little cheaper though. The lemon matcha is my favorite flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Harris

customer_reviews.title: Best dang bar yet :)
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have been eating dang bars for past 6 months as part of a Keto lifestyle. This bar surpasses all the others in taste and texture. It’s not as dry as some. We love peanut butter anything! It’s become a daily treat!
customer_reviews.author: masonmom

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for stabilizing my blood sugar levels, give me a sweet, healthy treat and also provide me with an energy bar when I need it. I really love these, unfortunately, they give my son stomach aches. Not sure why. Maybe he has a problem with chia. These have a great taste, aren't too sweet and they are a decent size. Will order again. 4/2/19 Update...I have become addicted to these! I order two of the 12 pack boxes a month. I really look forward to my Dang bar daily now. As sensitive as I am, I have had no stomach or other issues with these bars. Love the chocolate!
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Awful product!
customer_reviews.text: These were absolutely inedible! I thought they might be slightly protein tasting, but they were so awful we could not taste anything except yuck and grit. In the trash! Such a waste!
customer_reviews.author: Gayla Pappenfoht

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These are SO good, the lemon matcha flavor is amazing. They are sweet, but not too sweet, and the crunchy texture is great! My box of 12 is almost gone, I also shared them with non-keto friends and they also really liked them! Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Suel

customer_reviews.title: Yep, it's good!
customer_reviews.text: I like that these bars are not overly sweet. I have given up sugar for health reasons, and so I am hyper aware of anything with too much sugar. These taste great without being sickeningly sweet. Finally, a grab and go bar that isn't loaded with sugar! They taste just the way they are, so I can eat them with confidence that my health isn't being compromised when I want something convenient. They can also serve as a dessert along with a convenient way to get a power pack of nutrition.
customer_reviews.author: KatieScarlettTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Best of all of them!
customer_reviews.text: The Lemon ones are very flavorful and have a good lemon flavor. I like this flavor the best. I wish they had a little more protein grams but, over all they are one of my favorite bars right now and I am a big bar person. I have over a dozen types in my pantry at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: Pennycolada

customer_reviews.title: These are AWFUL!
customer_reviews.text: I have dieted for 50 years and learned to pretty much eat cardboard and like, or at least tolerate it. I choked down one bite of these bars and forced myself to take a second. I ended up spitting it out in the trash can. They taste AWFUL! I will throw out the entire rest of the variety box and mark them off my list! I will stick with the Slim Fast Keto bars. They are expenses, but taste great. If you end up throwing something out like these bars, it doesn't matter what it cost!
customer_reviews.author: KWP

customer_reviews.title: They really are good!
customer_reviews.text: I love this as an afternoon snack while on my Keto diet. It's very hard to find things that aren't loaded with carbs and sugar. I prefer these over some other Keto bars as they are like a delicious crumbly cookie. The Chocolate and Sea Salt is my favorite flavor!
customer_reviews.author: klp

customer_reviews.title: Best Keto bars
customer_reviews.text: I have tried lots of bars over the years and these are by far the best ones both in taste and texture. They do have a little gritty taste, but most protein bars I have tried have a gritty taste, (unless packed with tons of carbs & sugar). Also, I didn't find these to have a nasty after taste. I will be ordering more of these. Make a quick breakfast choice with my keto coffee in the morning. The other ones I like are the Bullet proof bars, but again they have a gritty taste due to the protein powder used. Don't get me started on the slim fast keto bars; they are just NASTY.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Flavor and Texture is fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: Best keto bar on the market!!! I have tried other bars and ended up giving them away because the texture/taste wasn't great...but these Dang bars are awesome!! I started out with the sampler park...love them all but for breakfast the lemon or vanilla are more conducive than the chocolate....save the chocolate for when I'm craving a desert...i would love to see these bars in a blueberry or strawberry flavor!! Try these...you won't be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Lym09

customer_reviews.title: I'm going to order more
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the reviews, I was skeptical about these bars. But I was looking for vegetarian Keto at a good price and ordered anyway. These keto bars taste good. The flavors I tried: chocolate sea salt, vanilla almond, and even lemon matcha, are tasty. I crave them now. They are a bit crumbly and are packed with nuts, but that's what I'd expect from a vegetarian, low-sugar -- non-fruit based snack bar made from nuts, and pea protein. I'd rather not have them too moist either. They also sate hunger, so that's an additional fit for why I'd order these for my try at the keto diet.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good Taste and Keto Friendly
customer_reviews.text: I found the bars to be tasty, but there is a back taste of stevia and I don't care for stevia. But I find it to be the best of all the keto bars I have tasted thus far and I will buy again. But no "5s" until the stevia taste is totally gone.
customer_reviews.author: Jean N

customer_reviews.title: Last box tasted like soap! Unable to return them. :-(
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars. Since going Keto, they have been a staple in my diet and I had them on a subscription order. Sadly, the last box I received tasted absolutely terrible....like soap! I sampled four bars and was too scared to try any more. So I tried returning them, but for some reason they are not returnable even though it's only been 10 days since they were delivered. Not sure I would trust ordering them from amazon again, especially if I can't return them if they are bad.
customer_reviews.author: MiriamEdna

customer_reviews.title: Dry, Nearly Tasteless, NOT Worth the Price!
customer_reviews.text: These bars were dry and nearly tasteless. I actually couldn’t taste any of the ingredients except for a hint of coconut. They were difficult to eat after I removed the wrapper; they just crumbled in my hands! Unless I wanted to lick the pieces off the floor, I couldn’t eat them! Ick! I didn’t return them because now that I know their weaknesses, I’ll keep a bowl under them and keep a glass of almond milk handy. Way too expensive for this much trouble!
customer_reviews.author: TreasuresLB

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars considering it's Keto
customer_reviews.text: Yes, they are small. I could eat a Banana Split the size my thumb for 11 carbs and yet? It totally took the edge off and it didn't take me out of ketosis and send my life into ruin. The box arrived Thursday, it's Tuesday and between teens trying them to comment: "Dang That's Bad" and my own snacking, I am ordering more now and will be again.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Saint Amour

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting plant-based protein bars
customer_reviews.text: These are the best tasting plant-based protein bars I've tried! I like that they are truly keto-friendly and feel like I'm eating REAL FOOD with the almonds, sunflower seeds, and other things in these bard. Very satisfying and delicious, especially the lemon matcha and chocolate flavors. The only drawback is they are quite pricey so I can't eat these regularly, but once in a while as a nice healthy treat.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Parry

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty bars, a little bit expensive
customer_reviews.text: I like all three flavors in the variety pack. The lemon has the perfect amount of flavoring. The chocolate tastes very similar to fudge. The almond vanilla is a very mild but yummy flavor. They all have a subtle aftertaste. The texture is very different for a low carb bar. It is crumbly, and also has a very slight crunch. I like the texture. These are plant based with natural ingredients which is another plus. The only thing I wish is that they were a little more affordable.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: BEST VEGAN KETO PROTEIN BAR THAT IS DELISH!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I have done my research, read hundreds of reviews trying to find the BEST Vegan Keto protein bar out there that has the perfect low amounts of sugar, carbs, fat and nice bit of protein but tastes delicious! Well, I have found the holy grail! Brand: Dang Flavor: Lemon Matcha . Soooo good! This will now be my go to protein bar from now on! My search is now over!! Yeah!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Great keto snack bars
customer_reviews.text: These are a really great keto friendly snack bar. Unlike other "low carb" stuff these actually have the right macros. One of these and a piece of cheese and I am no longer hungry in the afternoon. The chocolate flavor is actually the least desirable but the lemon matcha is outstanding and vanilla almond is decent. They are a bit chalky but not overly sweet. Going to order the 6 pack variety next.
customer_reviews.author: L. Tank

customer_reviews.title: Great Healthy Snack!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by the good flavor of each flavor of the Dang bar. A good, clean flavor without all the sugar. I was also happy to find that there is no gluten or dairy as I cannot have either. I am very satisfied with the bars. I originally bought them to travel with me as I like to have a protein bar in the morning when I travel since I want the nutrition but not the heaviness of a big breakfast. I will now be eating these at home too.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Cangelosi

customer_reviews.title: No crap ingredients, decent flavor.
customer_reviews.text: On the product overview photo on Amazon the ingredients list was partially, covered by the fold of the wrapper, I ordered it anyway and was expecting there would be sugar or some kind of ingredient that I didn’t want in there. Pleasantly surprised to find it was all good! (Please show entire ingredients list) flavor wise, like most health food... the vanity a flavor should be set aside, and the focus should be on the nutrition content and quality of ingredients, this product was great! Thank you for not sneaking sugar and other crap ingredients into your product. More companies like you are needed, thank you for your contribution to health and nutrition.
customer_reviews.author: edward vandervelde

customer_reviews.title: Work with Dr. Gundry Diet
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these health bars! I thought I would get a deal off Amazon buying in bulk but I think buying at Whole Foods is cheaper. Maybe they are having a sale right now but they are $1.75 ea and when I purchased this box of 12 it was over $3 each! I had free shipping but maybe they just tacked the shipping onto the price. My favorite flavor is lemon and next is Chocolate. Dang, these are the best!! So hard to find bars that taste good w/o oats and other bad stuff in them. These are great for Dr. Gundry followers.
customer_reviews.author: yellowchristi

customer_reviews.title: If you are going keto, get these.
customer_reviews.text: These are probably some of the tastiest bars that I have had. I recently started doing keto around a week ago and needed something to snack on on the go so I wouldn't be tempted into garbage food. These Dang! bars are a god send. The lemon matcha ones taste like a lemon bar and they are just all around tasty. Texture is a little chalky, but overall they taste great and are filling. I will be buying more of these when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: kr1xus7

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Interesting... as a person used to traditional quest bars I thought I’d give these a try as they are free from “bad artificial sugars” The almond cookie was pretty good... the chew factor was legit on all. Chocolate was not sweet and tasted vegetable-y. Lemon matcha was just off... the protein content is less and I felt full for less time than I do with quest. Not great, not terrible.
customer_reviews.author: ECorrigan5280

customer_reviews.title: Delicious lemony treat!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars! Great consistency with perfect amount of Lemon flavor. Remind me of a delicious shortbread or a lemon poppyseed muffin. There are a lot of tiny seeds, which I like but may cause problems for some with dental or digestive issues.
customer_reviews.author: Punpyre

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious! The lemon taste is the perfect amount of zest. Feel like it was a perfect snack without an overload of sugar. I am addicted to the lemon. Shocked at how low the sugar content is!!!
customer_reviews.author: CaliGirl

customer_reviews.title: boring taste - did not satisfy that need for a treat
customer_reviews.text: Very dissapointed....I LOVE the Good Fats Lemon Mousse bars, keto friendly and great quality. They were not available for quick delivery so I tried Dangs Lemon bars given we're in a pandemic pinch. I could barely taste lemon OR coconut, definitely no taste of macha, incredibly boring treat, I'll eat them because they were expensive which is another reason this buy makes me unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good with none of the bad stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I got a sample in a food order and my wife commented that it tasted like the inside of a Butterfinger without the chocolate. That is a bit kind in my opinion, but it still tastes great. Best part is no sugar alcohol to mess up your stomach or cause headaches! This increases the carbs a bit so be careful.
customer_reviews.author: The Shizzy

customer_reviews.title: Cardboard
customer_reviews.text: Probably worse then cardboard. Can't stomach them. The Atkins brand is so much better. I could be on the hit TV show "Alone" on day 75 and turn one of these bad boys away. Just saying.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Tanner

customer_reviews.title: hard to eat
customer_reviews.text: these have the worst texture they just crumble like sand and they are so so so dry. it hurts my teeth to eat it and they don't taste good at all. very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Yanan

customer_reviews.title: Best Keto bar I have found.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying all different types of Keto bar and this peanut butter bar by far, the best. It’s fabulous! I highly recommend the peanut butter bar. The coconut bar is also very good but I don’t not recommend the chocolate favor bars. Unfortunately it has that same chemical taste so many others have.
customer_reviews.author: chimes81

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I love them. The Lemon Matcha is my favorite. Following a ketogenic lifestyle can be difficult when you are on the go. These bars are perfect for a quick snack.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes we need something that is SUPER delish!
customer_reviews.text: I love this almond vanilla Dang Bar! What a treat. I know what the maker/developer means when he says that he wanted something really good, so he just whipped these up himself... I often make things for myself that are completely satisfying. But thanks to him and the many other Keto recipe developers, we can have something quick and so DANG great to eat!
customer_reviews.author: C. Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: If you like lemon you will love these bars. Wish they were less expensive however, vegan, low sugar, low carb all in one is hard to find, let alone be delicious~ Other favorites were chocolate mint and toasted coconut, you can try the sampler pack first to find your favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Not a very good tasting bar
customer_reviews.text: I am an old school bodybuilder. I used to consume some pretty bad tasting bodybuilding products back in the day because that was all that was available. There are very few products out there today that I find distasteful. But this bar ... it's not something I'd buy again. It's just plain BAD.
customer_reviews.author: joe aversano

customer_reviews.title: No Flavor
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciate the ingredients in this bar, but it tastes so chalky! There's no sweetness and even the chocolate tastes crumbly and dry. I really wanted to like it. Maybe the flavor I chose isn't so great because I don't understand how other people are giving this five stars. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Day BAR
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my second or third review over a decade of shopping from Amazon and i feel like i had to say something about the manufacturers of this product. The bar is absolutely disgusting. I truly don't understand how this product made it to the market. The entire box is going in the trash today.... very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Dang, That's Good
customer_reviews.text: On the expensive side but what isn't on Keto (cheaper than some other companies bars though!). I will say these do taste very good, they kept me feeling full and I really enjoyed the crunch these bars offered while also being sweet and healthy. I liked them so much I have already ordered another box.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Dry, unpleasant texture
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a fair number of protein bars n my life, but this is my first keto bar. It’s the worst tasting bar I e ever had. Very flaky and dry. Unpleasant texture. May be standard for keto bars, but horrible in comparison to standard protein bars.
customer_reviews.author: Julie A. Arney

customer_reviews.title: Plant Based/Keto Friendly - Oh Yeah.....and it tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: Have been on a personal war with carbs to ward off pre-diabetes symptoms and this is a great find!! Just in the right proportions of carbs/fat/protein for my Keto diet and I use it as a great quick snack or lunch replacement - just filling enough. With all the animal fats that are often unavoidable with Keto, it is a great relief to have such a practical plant based solution. Because is tastes great there is no sense of sacrifice for health. Keep it up Dang! Any more Keto friendly products in the pipeline?
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Curiously good
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered the 3 flavor box and instead received the 6 flavor. I’m happy with the mistake. So far I’ve only eaten 3 flavors .. the CARDAMOM being my favorite! (Nice choice of ingredient!!!) While the bars aren’t sweet, I find them to be curiously good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me and my Keto diet
customer_reviews.text: I started a Keto eating regime and I needed something sweet. These bars are sweet enough, chewy enough to satisfy that craving and keep me on the Keto target.
customer_reviews.author: Tijeras Tess

customer_reviews.title: Could not eat
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately everything about this bar was unappealing. The taste was unfavorable and nothing like coconut. The texture was poor. I have never returned anything or written a unfavorable review but this was too bad to not comment. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Harbison

customer_reviews.title: SO DANG GOOD!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly didn't know what to expect with these, I just knew I wanted to try them based on the reviews. At first bite, I was a tiny bit put off because they are so dense, but quickly got over that aspect of it and THEY ARE SOOOOO GOOD! I have tried every flavor now in the box, and there isn't one I don't like. Give them a try if you need a sweet treat while on Keto. Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Aschenbrenner

customer_reviews.title: Good taste, just okay on carbs!
customer_reviews.text: Tast is okay but too high on carbs for regular use. Will save for emergency nothing else available situation.
customer_reviews.author: Nana23a

customer_reviews.title: One of the best tasting keto bars
customer_reviews.text: There are a few keto bars out there and most of them do not taste that great. They have the strong licorice/sweetener taste that lingers...this bar is super tasty and has wonderful natural ingredients and tastes great. It is certainly my favorite go to snack on the run and i pack it whenever I fly somewhere. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Neubauer

customer_reviews.title: Old or bad bars
customer_reviews.text: I purchase these at the grocery store and live them. This was my first time ordering online and I would not do it again. They taste terrible, I am not sure if they were old or got hot and it changed their flavor. I only ate 1 and it came out of the package oily.
customer_reviews.author: brandy thuringer

customer_reviews.title: Gross- tasting and texture
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely disgusting so far. I ordered them for my medical office and the staff won't even eat them & neither will I. The order was placed with a quantity of 3 by mistake and the return policy shows these are not eligible for return. Try one before you buy a box. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Good taste--No grit
customer_reviews.text: They were tasty. Not gritty, not the taste of protien concentrate. Just taate like the tlavor or what it says.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Darn Good
customer_reviews.text: I feel like for what they are they are pretty good. Give you the illusion of eating something more substantial. Taste is good too, not super over flavored, more of a mild nutty flavor. Crunchy like as cracker or cookie. I quite like them.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina M. Switzer

customer_reviews.title: Gritty
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I'm not used to Keto foods, but these things are kinda nasty. They're all gritty and flavorless. I got the variety pack and the only 2 I could get down were the chocolate and the lemon. But they still were kinda rough.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon S

customer_reviews.title: Expired
customer_reviews.text: First time trying these and unsure if I would like them if i had gotten a batch that was still good. Took one bite and the odd texture had me looking to check the expiration date, my bad - it's over a month past, even though it was just delivered today.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chemical taste
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to try something new and these were endorsed by Keto Connect. My taste buds must be very different, thought they were artifically flavored, full of rice crispy like bits and just not something I found good to eat.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rowdy

customer_reviews.title: Love these bars!!
customer_reviews.text: It is so hard to find great-tasting, plant-based keto snack bars, and I've finally found them - yay! Especially love the lemon and the vanilla-almond. Would be great to have another fruit one, like blueberry.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Markham

customer_reviews.title: The worse bar I have ever tried
customer_reviews.text: This chocolate bar is the worse I have ever tried in my life. I wish I could return it. Waste of money. I am not sure how this product has 4 out of 5 star with many reviews!
customer_reviews.author: Hayam

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty when you need something crunchy!
customer_reviews.text: Bars are awesome! They are a bit expensive, but if I've learned anything going down the low carb and/or Keto route is that it always costs a bit more to get foods that are better for you and have less refined junk in them. We're used to paying for cheap carbs these days, so getting past the sticker shock can be tough.
customer_reviews.author: zunar_j5

customer_reviews.title: Lemon yum
customer_reviews.text: These were delicious. Who needs to make lemon bars when you have these lying around? They're smaller than I'd like; but probably better on the waistline. Real almonds and lemon flavor were a great combination. Definitely order again
customer_reviews.author: Mary Paar

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bar to try something instead of a fastbar, which breaks my wallet. I’m not a picky eater but this bar failed me on all the levels. It tastes absolutely awful, terribly dry, has a texture of dry soil, hard to bite into and falls apart. I’d rather pay twice and get a good tasting quality product. Keto or fasting doesn’t have to taste terrible!
customer_reviews.author: Viktoriya Golbraykh

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and Yummy all in one!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Bars and a superior healthy choice. Just what I was looking for with clean ingredients and low sugar. They are a little more $$ but worth it to eat clean and healthy so in my book that’s PRICELESS!! My family loves them and ate half the box already so I will be ordering more. All of the flavors are fabulous. So good you won’t believe they’re healthy. Go for it and try them.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolette D

customer_reviews.title: Taste Great!
customer_reviews.text: I think these bars are a great option for a vegan, keto snack. They taste great and do help with hunger. The only thing I notice is that they are a little grainy I am guessing due to protien powder of some sort. I am not saying they are bad, but it is just noticeable. I will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: If you want keto bar, this is the one!
customer_reviews.text: A good treat in between a meal, or awhile after a meal. I love these bars! The consistency is unique--it's dry yet crunchy, seedy--the variety and quality of ingrediemts in the bar makes the texture very interesting and satisfying. Not very sweet, but is satisfyingly flavorful. I gave it a 4 star instead of 5 so that not everyone would grab them immediately and be disappointed. I can see how many people would not like them at all. Also, they are quite expensive!! They are subtle, I guess, but for me, DANG they're good!!! I think it's a "love me" or "hate me" kind of protein bar.
customer_reviews.author: sheila

customer_reviews.title: It’s a hard pass!!
customer_reviews.text: In the words of my husband, “ they should renamed these , Dang! They’re Awful!”. I knew these probably wouldn’t be that great , but I mean they’re disgusting (to us anyway, to each his own). We tried each flavor , trying little pieces and each bite became worse and worse. We just threw the box out.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Very Bland & Dry.
customer_reviews.text: I gave these bars a 2star because of the ingredients only. The taste is bland & they are too dry. All 3 flavors were bland(almond had the best aftertaste of all 3. They needed to add a plant sweetener to help get them down. Looking for another brand. Keto brand is very expensive & ive never tried them.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Garten

customer_reviews.title: these bars are abosulety horrible, chalk would taste better, expensive and just not a good choice
customer_reviews.text: do not order these bars, very chalky tasting, cannot return item, very disappointed I cannot return box I have never given a negative review like this, so to take the time trust the review.
customer_reviews.author: COLETTE

customer_reviews.title: Dang, that was super good and filling
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical about these. I got them in a Keto sample box... lemon... seeds, didn't sound good. BUT I was starving and ate it and WOW, it was amazing. I love the texture and find that the flavor and the texture is great. Got myself a box and put them on auto reorder!
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great ingredients
customer_reviews.text: they are smaller than i expected as i eat them for lunch
customer_reviews.author: Kathy C.

customer_reviews.title: The worst bar I’ve ever eaten.
customer_reviews.text: This was disgusting. I threw it out after one bite.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be smooth, however the Lemon wasn’t it has way too many almonds in it. The almonds got stuck in my teeth. It was a waste of my money. I’ll never buy from them again!
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing — I wish I had read about how dry and mealy they were
customer_reviews.text: I am willing to try almost anything, I’m not exceptionally picky about bars, I want clean nutrition that isn’t hard to eat. These are HARD to eat they are so dry and mealy, they taste so disgusting! I wish I had been warned because they weren’t cheap and I am unable to return. PSA DONT buy these bars!
customer_reviews.author: cathleens

customer_reviews.title: New Improved Recipe
customer_reviews.text: I received 3 free Dang Bars with the new recipe, Peanut Butter, Matcha Lemon and Crazy Rich Chocolate. I liked them so much I ordered a whole box! Not nearly as crumbly as the original but not weirdly plasticky, gummy like some other bars. ❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: They are good, and different
customer_reviews.text: I like the flavors and the fact they are plant based protein and low carb. Expensive is the only thing, but you get what you pay for. The Cardamom and the Lemon bars are excellent and different from what is on the market. Enough with peanut butter and chocolate already
customer_reviews.author: Chris Husted

customer_reviews.title: Stevia after flavor
customer_reviews.text: It was good, when you first bite it I will admit it is a little dry, but the flavor it good. The problem is the after taste, if you dont like the after taste of stevia you will not enjoy these bars. Since I purchased them I wony waste it, but I wouldn't buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Lennox28

customer_reviews.title: Sadly disappointed by this bar
customer_reviews.text: This bar honestly was awful. I was excited to try it when I saw all the natural ingredients in it. However when I took a bite, the texture was terrible. Very chewy and not really much of a chocolate flavor at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Meronnis

customer_reviews.title: So delicious.
customer_reviews.text: I love them. All the flavors are great. The chocolate is the best. Lemon is my second fave. The consistency is more Halavah than your usual protein or vegan bar. They’re fantastic for plant-based keto.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: Not bad but for the price, it's a bit disappointing. I've had better keto bars. But the ingredients are good quality. I might give another shot on the different flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Dang Keto Bar
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the ingredients in the keto Bar. The chocolate was very bitter and nasty and I would not recommend this bar to anyone. I was told that I would received a REFUND due to my prime membership as a (Couresty to me).
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Dang - why did I buy?
customer_reviews.text: Taste-less, hard & crumbly. I was hoping to find a new product to love but this isn't it.
customer_reviews.author: oz67401

customer_reviews.title: Dang Bar
customer_reviews.text: I did not enjoy the flavor or consistency of this bar.
customer_reviews.author: GW

customer_reviews.title: Bland and Crumbly
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried this bar twice and I just can’t get past the flavor and consistency. It’s on the bland side and can be crumbly although I heard they are going to change the recipe soon. I probably won’t get these again tough.
customer_reviews.author: Laura A

customer_reviews.title: Great if you are a bird.
customer_reviews.text: Great if you are a bird. These are loaded with little seeds. I ordered a box of three flavors and not one flavor was good. If you like a bar of seeds this may be for you.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Bailey

product_meta.title: Dang Keto Bar | Almond Cookie | 12 Pack | Keto Certified, Vegan, Low Carb, Low Sugar, Plant Based, Non GMO, Gluten Free Snacks | 5g Net Carbs, 9g Protein, No Added Sugars
feature_bullets: DANG, THAT'S GOOD: Great texture, incredible taste. These low sugar bars are made with real ingredients that you can actually see and taste. Packed with almonds, sunflower and chia seeds. Slightly sweet with a hint of vanilla and creamy almond butter.

PERFECT KETO SNACK: Dang Bar has the ideal macronutrient ratio for the ketogenic diet with 5g Net Carbs, 14g Fat and 9g Protein. Perfect for office snacks, quick breakfast bars or as an alternative to granola bars or protein bars.

PLANT BASED FATS AND PROTEINS: Stay full and feel lighter with healthy plant based fats from coconut, cocoa butter, almonds, and vegan pea protein. No animal collagen, dairy, egg whites or whey protein in these delicious keto bars.

NOTHING BUT THE GOOD STUFF: A Keto Snack Bar with 100% Plant Based, Gluten Free, Dairy Free, Vegan ingredients. Low sugar with no added sugars, no artificial sweeteners, cane sugar, maple syrup, rice syrup, honey or dates!

KEEP IT LOW CARB AND KETO: Dang Bars are crafted with real, good for you ingredients. No Birthday Cake flavors over here, and no artificial ingredients either. Better for you, low carb, keto snacks. Each box contains 12 - 1.4oz protein bars.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
